name: elevator fps
description:
A game with a lot elevators.

Note: on Level 3 it may crash for some reason so save the game when u are on level 3.

i am sorry for Macos & Linux gamers.

made by a Russian boi, nobody else.

Made with gameguru.

it has not so much levels so dont except much for now.

Everything from gameguru Except:

-Shotgun model(was made by someone)

-Lift script(not mine too)

-intro song(made by me sorry if u dont like i am not pro sound maker)

Thanks for playing!

how to play:

WASD = walk

Shift = run

1 2 3 4 etc/ scroll wheel = guns

0 = bare hands(they are weak and will not fight)

f = flashlight

Those things(photo right up this text) is an elevator, step on it and you will go on another floor
